column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Sunny - Thanks for your great review. We appreciate your feedback
column2: as well as your wise advice. A few years ago
column3: Japanese ramen wasn't really an option for dining out
column4: but just a few years later
column5: we feel we are helping introduce this cuisine -- and Japanese dining culture -- to Houston in a big way. Thanks for being a part of it with us!
